snippet: President Obama’s recent proposal to overhaul the corporate tax system is timely and, if adopted, would restore the competitiveness of American businesses, an economist writes.

lead_paragraph: Laura D’Andrea Tyson is a professor at the Haas School of Business at the University of California, Berkeley, and served as chairwoman of the Council of Economic Advisers under President Bill Clinton.
